mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM student s WHERE s.sid = #{sid} AND s.delete_time IS NULL
mapper.sql:
SELECT s.id AS id, s.sid AS sid, s.class_id AS classId, s.sex AS sex, s.`name` AS `name`, s.email AS email, s.mobile AS mobile, c.`name` AS className, m.`name` AS majorName, cl.`name` AS collegeName
FROM student s LEFT JOIN class c ON c.id = s.class_id LEFT JOIN major m ON m.id = c.major_id LEFT JOIN college cl ON cl.id = m.college_id where s.delete_time is NULL
mapper.select: SELECT student.*, major.name as major_name, class.name as class_name, college.name as college_name FROM student join class on student.class_id = class.id join major on class.major_id = major.id join college on major.college_id = college.id WHERE class.college_id = #{collegeId}
